entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
